name: DUBOIS AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT v. DUBOIS AREA EDUCATION ASSOCIATION, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Dubois Area School District v. Dubois Area Education Ass'n

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
FLAHERTY, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: DUBOIS AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT v. DUBOIS AREA EDUCATION ASSOCIATION, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
FLAHERTY, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: William A. Hebe, Wellsboro, for appellant.
Bari K. Boyer, David P. King, DuBois, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
440 A.2d 1191
DUBOIS AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT v. DUBOIS AREA EDUCATION ASSOCIATION, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 19, 1982.
Decided Feb. 19, 1982.
William A. Hebe, Wellsboro, for appellant.
Bari K. Boyer, David P. King, DuBois, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
